biotools.summary: GRASP is a gene annotation tool for metagenomic studies. GRASP assembles the fragmented short-peptides, which are called from the NGS reads, and aligns the assembled contigs to the query reference protein. GRASP achieves much higher sensitivity than BLASTP for gene annotation purpose.
